Comments_List: I learned and am learning how to interpret different pieces with intention, emotion, and artistry, moreso in terms of emotions and tone instead of musical terminology. This is a shift from my past playing.

I learn so much in each of my lessons with Wendy. While she is very patient, she also pushes me just enough that it keeps my motivation and excitement about learning the violin up. This semester, I have learned a lot about bow technique, and I am getting better about being forte in the left hand! :)
I do not have a way to be graded on certain pieces, which i feel might provide more motivation. I also dont have a formal way to perform, which would also help drive me.
I love learning alongside and from another student. I love maintaining and improving my playing despite everything else going on in my life.
